text: Hanki antahiho, ko tare zupa ome tamage'noe, meni mago'ene ome tamageku nehuankina tamagrira kna ontamigahue. Na'ankure mofavremo'za nerera nefazana kva hunonteanki, Nererake nefake mofavre'amo eriniazana antenteno nevuno kegava hunente. Ana hunegu tamagripintira mago'zana e'origahuanki, tamagri tamagu tamemo so'e hanigu nave'nesige'na nehue.
